title.rendered: All New Eldorado Outdoor™ Wood-burning Fireplace

content.rendered:
The ultimate way to take the chill off a cool night outdoors is with the warming glow of a genuine wood-burning fireplace. However, adding such a welcome feature to any backyard has traditionally been a daunting prospect, rife with high costs, large outlays for labor, and the mess of pouring concrete. Now, with the new Eldorado Outdoor™ Wood-Burning Fireplace from Eldorado Stone®, a magnificent—and totally custom—wood-burning fireplace can be achieved in a fraction of the time and cost associated with traditional installations. The secret lies in the Eldorado Outdoor building blocks that quickly assemble into the perfect substrate to install with the company’s authentic architectural stone veneer profiles.

The new Eldorado Outdoor Wood-Burning Fireplace is an impressive-looking structure, standing five-and-a-half feet wide, more than three feet deep, and nearly seven feet high. Yet its massive dimensions are counter to its light weight and simple installation. Crafted of glass-fiber reinforced concrete (GFRC), the fireplace can be installed without the need for concrete footings—a standard four-inch concrete or paver substrate is all you need. With its scratch-coat finish, it’s ready to accept any of the beautiful profiles from the diverse Eldorado Stone and Eldorado Brick lines of architectural veneers, so that any style, from mediterranean to coastal, can be achieved.

 

Download Press Release
